task_description: Create a new Evolution API HTTP client service to replace the GREEN-API SDK.

patterns.http_client_pattern: axios.create({ baseURL, headers }) with response interceptors for error handling
patterns.logger_pattern: Use NestJS Logger class: private readonly logger = new Logger(ClassName.name)
patterns.error_handling_pattern: try-catch with logger.error() and HttpException throwing

existing_implementations.description: GhlService shows axios HTTP client patterns with interceptors and error handling

conventions.lowercase_apikey_header: Evolution API uses lowercase 'apikey' header, not 'apiKey'
conventions.instance_path_param: Most endpoints use {instanceName} as path parameter
conventions.timeout_config: Should set default timeout on axios instance
